title: EpiHiper run parameters
description: A schema describing the run parameters for EpiHiper

diseaseModel.description: Filename of the disease model in a json file.

intervention.description: Filename of the interventions in a json file.

initialization.description: Filename of the initializations in a json file.

traits.description: Filename of the json file containing node and edge traits.

startTick.description: The start tick for the simulation run

endTick.description: The start tick for the simulation run

personTraitDB.description: An optional list of json files each describing a person trait database to be loaded.

items.description: Filename of a person trait database description in a json file.
